page.title: 04Monwell Hankinson Group
page.content: {MONWEL HANKINSON GROUP The group consists of three factories in Gwent.The factory we visited is in Ebbw Vale.It provides employment for 43 disabled people.This is achieved with the help of grants from the Manpower Services Commission. Employees are trained by the group with skills compatible to their disability.They manufacture road traffic signs,plastic coated sign posts,wire guards and general wire work,plastic engraved nameplates and do sheet metal work. The manager,Mr. Walton,made it possible for us to visit the factory.It was the first time we had been to a factory and we were very impressed by what we saw.The employees were happy in their work and were pleased to see us.
